name: Deep Gnome Scout
description: The Deep Gnome Scout is a Medium humanoid known for its agility and stealth, featuring a keen sense of perception and camouflage abilities. It navigates rocky terrain with ease and is equipped with a War Pick.
memorable: Its ability to blend into rocky environments and enhance its stealth makes it formidable for scouting tasks.
goals: To gather information and navigate safely through rocky terrains.
relations: May be encountered alongside other deep gnomes or in service to gnome communities.
environment: Typically found in rocky or subterranean terrains.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity enhances stealth and agility, while magic resistance offers resilience against spells.
weaknesses: Average physical strength and limited combat versatility due to low hit points.
attacks: Attacks with a War Pick, delivering piercing damage, and can inflict blindness with a spell.
most_powerful_ability: Its ability to cast Blindness, creating significant tactical advantages in combat.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 16, enhanced by keen hearing and sight.
skills: Proficient in stealth, survival, and perception, making it adept at exploration and reconnaissance.
additional_information: Has advantage on Stealth checks in rocky terrain.
Can cast spells like disguise self and nondetection.
Advantage on saving throws against magic.
Can easily evade detection with stealth tactics.
spellcasting: Able to cast blindness/deafness, disguise self, and nondetection once per long rest.
test_queries: agile creature that blends into rocky terrain
Deep Gnome capable of casting blindness
medium humanoid known for its agility
perceptive creature that excels in stealth
